headline: Constellation Energy (CEG) Secures AI Data Center Deals as Carbon-Free Power Demand Reshapes Utilities
summary: In recent days, Constellation Energy has gained attention as it secures new agreements with major tech firms amid surging AI-driven power demand and continued recognition as the largest producer of carbon-free electricity in the US. Analysts and investors have noted that the company's combination of nuclear energy supply, AI compatibility, and data center collaborations has elevated its standing within the utilities sector and could reshape power market economics. We'll explore how...
